com.musicplayer.keyboard

Class ShortcutBinding

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.musicplayer.keyboard.ShortcutBinding

  • public class ShortcutBinding
extends java.lang.Object
    Key binding to use shortcuts

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShortcutBinding(javax.swing.JFrame jframe)
      Get jframe content pane inputMap (the JComponent.WHEN_IN_FOCUSED_WINDOW) and actionMap
      ShortcutBinding(javax.swing.JFrame jframe, int inputMapType)
      Get jframe content pane inputMap (the inputMapType) and actionMap
      ShortcutBinding(javax.swing.JPanel jpanel)
      Get jpanel content pane inputMap (the JComponent.WHEN_IN_FOCUSED_WINDOW) and actionMap
      ShortcutBinding(javax.swing.JPanel jpanel, int inputMapType)
      Get jpanel content pane inputMap (the inputMapType) and actionMap

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAction(int id, java.lang.Runnable r)
      Used to put action into actionMap
      void addBind(int keyCode, int modifiers, java.lang.Runnable r)
      Add key and modifier to inputMap and calls r in the actionMap Do not overwrite existant action with id preexistant
      void addEvent(int id, int keyCode, int modifiers)
      Key and modifier to call acitonMap with the id

    • Method Detail

      • addBind

        public void addBind(int keyCode,
                    int modifiers,
                    java.lang.Runnable r)
        Add key and modifier to inputMap and calls r in the actionMap Do not overwrite existant action with id preexistant
        Parameters:
        keyCode - usage example : KeyEvent.VK_SPACE
        modifiers - usage example : KeyEvent.CTRL_MASK | KeyEvent.ALT_MASK
        r -

      • addEvent

        public void addEvent(int id,
                     int keyCode,
                     int modifiers)
        Key and modifier to call acitonMap with the id
        Parameters:
        id - reference to the action in action map
        keyCode - usage example : KeyEvent.VK_SPACE
        modifiers - usage example : KeyEvent.CTRL_MASK | KeyEvent.ALT_MASK

      • addAction

        public void addAction(int id,
                      java.lang.Runnable r)
        Used to put action into actionMap
        Parameters:
        id - reference of the action
        r - action
